en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We're sorry, we've lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We're sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We're sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Twitch Prime license.
en.LOST_DLC: We're sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.PAUSE_PROGRESS_LOST: All current progress will be lost.
en.TMI_DESCRIPTION: Play a brand new mode that's all about the players
en.BACK_TO_PACK_DESCRIPTION: Exit back to the Party Pack
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
This is taking a while...
Please check your internet connection.
en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: on your mobile device to join in
en.POST_GAME_CHOICE_TITLE: What do you want to do now?
en.VIP_WAITING: Waiting for all players to join
en.VIP_POST_GAME: What would you like to do now?
en.VIP_CANCEL: Press this button to cancel game start
en.VOLUME_HOST_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the host.
en.VOLUME_SFX_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for sound effects.
en.VOLUME_MUSIC_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the music.
en.AUDIENCE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to allow non-contestants to join and affect the game.
en.EXTENDED_TIMERS_DESCRIPTION: Enable very long timers. Recommended only for streamed games.
en.PASSWORD_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Generate a password that players must enter to join the game.
en.TWITCH_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Require players to be logged into Twitch.
en.POSTGAME_SHARING_DESCRIPTION: Allow players to optionally share answers and scores from the game on social media.
en.FAMILY_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to avoid the game's more provocative content. To control player input, use MODERATION or the PROFANITY FILTER.
en.FILTER_PLAYERNAME_DESCRIPTION: Removes prompts that target a specific player in the game.
en.START_GAMEPAD_DESCRIPTION: Games must be started with controller, not from player devices.
en.HIDE_ROOM_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Allow the on-screen room code to be hidden.
en.MAX_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTION: Number of players that can join the game before people are added to the audience.
en.STATIC_BACKGROUNDS_DESCRIPTION: Reduce motion sensitivity with less-animated backgrounds.
en.PLAYER_CONTENT_FILTERING_HATE_SPEECH_DES: Words used in hateful speech will cause input to be rejected. Profanity is allowed.
en.PLAYER_CONTENT_FILTERING_PROFANITY_DESCR: Words used in hateful speech and profanity will cause input to be rejected.
en.MODERATION_DESCRIPTION:
Generate a password that moderators must enter.
Moderators join game at mod.jackbox.tv.
en.AWKWARD_TITLE: WORLD'S BEST PRODUCER OF AWKWARD MOMENTS
en.PHONE_TITLE: MOST IN NEED OF A NEW PHONE
en.COMEDIAN_DESCRIPTION: Lots of likes. Not so many votes.
en.PERSONALITY_B_DESCRIPTION: No, that was a lie, it's <PlayerName>
en.PHONE_DESCRIPTION: Waiting for that contract to end
en.PLASMA_DESCRIPTION: <PlayerName> once sold plasma to buy a Garth Brooks CD
en.CARDS_DESCRIPTION: <PlayerName> collects trading cards of famous dentists
en.TMI_STANDARD_ROUND_GAME_INSTRUCTION: Answer the prompt on your device honestly.
en.TMI_FINAL_ROUND_GAME_INSTRUCTION: Submit one truth and one lie about yourself.
en.ERROR_MISSING_INPUT: Please provide input in all fields.
en.ERROR_CLOSE_TO_TRUTH: You're too close to the truth, enter something else.
en.ERROR_SAME_TRUTH_AND_LIE: You cannot enter the same thing for your truth and lie.

The winner is %s
Drawn by %s

en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_MATCHUP_VOTE_WINNER: %s by %s won as the %s with %s percent of the vote and received %s points.
en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_MATCHUP_VOTE_CHAMPD_WIN: %s by %s is champ'd up as the %s with %s percent of the votes and received %s points.
en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_MATCHUP_TEAM_WIN: %s and %s by %s won as the %ss with %s percent of the vote and received %s points.
en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_MATCHUP_TEAM_CHAMPD: %s and %s by %s are champ'd up as the %ss with %s percent of the vote and received %s points.
en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_MATCHUP_VOTE_RESULT_TEA: %s and %s by %s as the %ss received %s points.
en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_GAME_WINNER_CHARACTER_N: The winning player's character names are:
en.CONTROLLER_FILTER_REJECTED_TEXT: That's not allowed, enter something else!
en.AUDIENCE_SURVEY_FINISHED_TEXT: Thank you for your input. You did your civic duty!
TIPS_AND_TRICKS: Need more time time creating life? Go to Settings and turn on Extended Timers.
Take a moment to digest your assignment. The timer starts when the last person begins drawing (max 15 seconds).
Color in your characters with the thick marker to really make those weirdos pop.
Made a drawing mistake? Of course you did. Tap the Undo button in the upper left corner.
Is your poor character facing the wrong direction during battle? Flip them on your device.
Playing with strangers? You may want to turn on the Moderation tool in Settings.
Creating a variety of characters in the first half pays off during tag outs.
TIPS_HIGH_FIDELITY: If you play a consecutive game with the same players, you can tag in your previous game’s characters.
